SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

capsules
Annotation Type Capsule

@Documented
public @interface Capsule

When applied to a package, indicates that code outside of the package and its subpackages should access only those types and members that carry the annotation specified by the exportKeyword attribute. To check that a program complies with its @Capsule annotations, run capsules.jar with the root of the program's class tree as an argument. For example: 

 java -jar capsules.jar C:\myproject\bin
Specify a list of package names as the value of the friends attribute to give those packages, and their subpackages, unrestricted access to this capsule. For example, 
 @capsules.Capsule(exportKeyword=SystemAPI.class, friends={"org.helper1", "org.helper2"})
 package org.system;
allows code in packages org.helper1 and org.helper2 to access non-exported elements below org.system.

Required Element Summary
 Class<?> exportKeyword
           
 
Optional Element Summary
 String[] friends
           
 

Element Detail

exportKeyword

public abstract Class<?> exportKeyword

friends

public abstract String[] friends
Default:
{}
